properties.plot: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.
A pseudo autobiography of disco's The Village People.
San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

properties.location: 24th Street between Mission Street and Potrero Avenue
properties.plot: Garvey is a San Francisco pawnshop operator. His unemployed and criminal friends Dillard, Turtle, and Weslake, team up with Boardwalk, a local pimp, to burgle Garvey's shop while the owner ...
At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
Bitter Melon is a "home for the holidays" dark comedy where a Filipino-American family plots to kill an abusive member.
A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...
A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.
A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

properties.film: A Taiwanese Tale of Two Cities
properties.film_year: A Taiwanese Tale of Two Cities  (2018)
properties.plot: A Taipei doctor and a San Francisco engineer swap homes in a daring pact, embarking on journeys filled with trials, secrets and unexpected encounters.
As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.
When Frank Johnson becomes an eyewitness to a murder, he's pursued around scenic San Francisco by his wife, the police, and the murderer.
A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.
An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.
After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.
A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.

San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore, with whom he's not too excited to be working.

properties.location: Bank of America (38th Street at Balboa Street)
properties.plot: In the 1970s, Patricia Hearst is abducted by American revolutionaries, but eventually joins their cause instead.
Nick and Nora are at their wisecracking best as they investigate murder and racketeering at a local race track.

properties.location: Belgravia Apartments (795 Sutter Street at Jones)
properties.plot: A nightclub singer inspires a doctor to fake his own murder, leading to plenty of complications.
After an ambitious actor insinuates himself into the life of a wealthy middle-aged playwright and marries her, he plots with his mistress to murder her.
A chronicled re-telling of the gay rights movement in the United States, beginning with the Stonewall riots in 1969.
The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.
An unhappily married socialite finds solace in the company of a recently divorced doctor.
A political strategist juggling three clients questions whether or not to take the high road as the ugly side of his work begins to haunt him.

properties.location: California Academy of Sciences (Golden Gate Park)
properties.plot: Paul Dietrich, at almost 30 years old, is a fading piano prodigy. Heidi Schoonover is a talented young pianist with a promising future. When Paul hears of an upcoming competition that could make his career, he dedicates himself to winning.

Set against the backdrop of 1960s San Francisco, BIRTH OF THE DRAGON is a modern take on the classic movies that Bruce Lee was known for. It takes its inspiration from the epic and still controversial showdown between an up-and-coming Bruce Lee and kung fu master Wong Jack Man - a battle that gave birth to a legend.
The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.
An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

properties.film: Dim Sum: A Little Bit of Heart
properties.film_year: Dim Sum: A Little Bit of Heart  (1985)
properties.plot: In San Francisco, an immigrant Chinese widow welcomes the new year with some unhappiness: she's 62 now, she wants to make a trip to China to pay last respects to her ancestors, a fortune ...
A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

properties.film: It Came From Beneath the Sea
properties.film_year: It Came From Beneath the Sea  (1955)
properties.plot: A giant, radioactive octopus rises from the Philippine Trench to terrorize the North American Pacific Coast.
After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.
The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

properties.film: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
properties.film_year: Tucker: The Man and His Dream  (1988)
properties.plot: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.
The life and friendship between the icons of the Beat Generation - Neal Cassady, Carolyn Cassady and Jack Kerouac.
A teenager's family falls apart, so he finds a better one.
The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.
The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.
Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.

Joey Evans' a charming, handsome, funny, talented a-1st class, A-N°.1 - heel. When Joey meets the former chorus girl and now is the rich widow, Vera Simpson, the pair of lecherous souls seem made for each other.
Concentration camp survivor Victoria Kowelska finds herself involved in mystery, greed, and murder when she assumes the identity of a dead friend in order to gain passage to America.

properties.location: Cordova Market, 301 Rolph Street, San Francisco
properties.plot: When a struggling writer, HIV positive for 20+ years, accidentally deposits a $100 birthday check, he is dropped from his health plan for earning too much. In this new era of sort-of ...
A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.
A young man Ajay (cancer victim) meets two lovely women Renu (wife) and Vidya (journalist) in his life.

properties.location: Fairmont Hotel (950 Mason Street, Nob Hill)
properties.plot: In London, a recently wed American woman's sanity comes into question after she claims to be the victim of a threatening stalker.
A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

properties.director: Jamie Babbit, Amanda Brotchie, Steven K. Tsuchida, Christian Ditter, John Riggi
properties.plot: Sophia, a misfit, discovers a passion for fashion, becoming an unlikely businesswoman in the process. As her business grows, however, she has to learn to cope with life as her own boss. This show is loosely based on the true story of Nasty Gal Founder, Sophia Amoruso.

properties.location: Fior d' Italia (601 Union Street at Stockton)
properties.plot: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

properties.location: Fort Point (Presidio, Golden Gate National Recreation Area)
properties.plot: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

properties.location: Golden Dragon Restaurant (816 Washington Street at Grant)
properties.plot: Two cab drivers search San Francisco's Chinatown for the mysterious Chan, who disappeared with their $4000.
A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.
A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.
A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

properties.film: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
properties.film_year: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country  (1991)
properties.plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.
An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

properties.film: Star Trek II : The Wrath of Khan
properties.film_year: Star Trek II : The Wrath of Khan  (1982)
properties.plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

properties.location: Grace Cathedral Episcopal Church (1100 California Street)
properties.plot: San Francisco debutante, Jessica Poole, is marrying Napa Valley cattle rancher, Roger Henderson, and hopes her peripatetic father, "Pogo" Poole, whom she hasn't seen for years, comes to the...

properties.location: Grace Cathedral Episcopal Church (1100 California Street)
properties.plot: A 1920s flapper who haunts her old house possesses a reserved housewife who just moved in. However, she cannot leave before she receives her massive audition for a Hollywood studio.

properties.plot: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
The ups and downs of a Norwegian immigrant family, circa 1910.
The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.
Based on the fascinating true-life story of Michael Glatze, a gay activist who becomes a Christian pastor after identifying as a heterosexual.

properties.location: Heart of the City Farmers Market at UN Plaza
properties.plot: Everyone assumed Sasha and Marcus would wind up together except for Sasha and Marcus. Reconnecting after 15 years, the two start to wonder - maybe?
Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

properties.film: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
properties.film_year: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home  (1986)
properties.plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.
A young man Ajay (cancer victim) meets two lovely women Renu (wife) and Vidya (journalist) in his life.
After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

properties.location: Mel's Drive-In (Corner of Van Ness & Mission Street, Mission District)
properties.plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

properties.location: On Board the SS President Cleveland, docked at Pier 50
properties.plot: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

properties.location: On Board the SS President Cleveland, docked at Pier 50
properties.plot: Premarital sex, secrets, and society. At 17, shy Susan Slade is on her way to California after a ten-year stay at a remote Chilean mine where her father was chief engineer. Onboard ship, ...
H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.
The experiences of three close friends living and loving in modern-day San Francisco.
Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.
A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

Set against the backdrop of 1960s San Francisco, BIRTH OF THE DRAGON is a modern take on the classic movies that Bruce Lee was known for. It takes its inspiration from the epic and still controversial showdown between an up-and-coming Bruce Lee and kung fu master Wong Jack Man - a battle that gave birth to a legend.
A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.
The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

properties.location: Potrero Hill Bathhouse & Feed Co. (199 Mississippi Street)
properties.plot: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.
An amateur tunesmith (Tommy Noonan) and a con man (Pete Marshall) pool their resources in order to win first prize in a songwriting contest
A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

properties.location: Ramada Plaza Hotel Downtown (1231 Market Street, Civic Center)
properties.plot: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.

properties.location: Saks Fifth Avenue (384 Post Street, Union Square)
properties.plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.
This send-up of ragtime song and dance begins in 1915 San Francisco when society boy Roger Grant decides to pursue popular rather than serious music.
Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.
A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Rory MacNeil, a rugged old Scotsman, travels to San Francisco to seek medical treatment. He moves in with his estranged son Ian, as he sees his life getting transformed through a newfound bond with his baby grandson.

properties.location: St. Elizabeth Apartment House (901 Powell Street at Sacramento)
properties.plot: After a freak accident, a yuppie turns invisible and runs from a treacherous CIA official, while trying to cope with his new life.

properties.location: St. Francis Episcopal Church (399 San Fernando Way)
properties.plot: In a small town in rural Kansas, a troubled veteran attempts to restore an old merry-go-round ride.

properties.location: St. Peter & Paul's Church (666 Filbert Street, Washington Square)
properties.plot: Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

properties.location: Stockton Tunnel (Stockton Street at Sutter Street)
properties.plot: San Francisco police detectives Freebie and Bean are determined to bust local crime boss Red Meyers at any cost, even if this means destroying the whole city in the process.

properties.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
properties.plot: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.
As bareknuckled boxing enters the modern era, brash extrovert Jim Corbett uses new rules and dazzlingly innovative footwork to rise to the top of the top of the boxing world.
A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally in 1906 San Francisco.
A documentary of the successful career and assassination of San Francisco's first elected gay city supervisor.
In San Francisco, a psychopathic gangster and his mentor retrieve heroin packages carried by unsuspecting travelers.
A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

properties.location: Tosca Café (242 Columbus Avenue, North Beach)
properties.plot: A recounting of Jack Kerouac's three sojourns to the cabin in Big Sur owned by his friend, poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti.
Tom,a junior doctor under suspension for fatally removing the wrong lung from a patient and nick-named Dr. Death,is working in Leeds as a paramedic with the knowing Julie,who sells sex aids...

properties.film: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
properties.film_year: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes  (2014)
properties.plot: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

properties.director: Alan Poul, Silas Howard, Stacie Passon
properties.plot: A middle-aged Mary Ann returns to San Francisco and reunites with the eccentric friends she left behind. "Tales of the City" focuses primarily on the people who live in a boardinghouse turned apartment complex owned by Anna Madrigal at 28 Barbary Lane, all of whom quickly become part of what Maupin coined a "logical family". It's no longer a secret that Mrs. Madrigal is transgender. Instead, she ...

properties.location: Washington Square Park - Filbert St at Stockton St
properties.plot: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

properties.location: Wells Fargo Bank (1 California Street, Financial District)
properties.plot: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones assaults clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.

properties.location: Yerba Buena Center for the Arts
properties.plot: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

properties.film: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
properties.film_year: The Diary of a Teenage Girl  (2015)
properties.plot: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.
A widow learns that her husband was a mobster and soon finds herself in the world of organized crime as she takes her revenge on those who murdered him.

properties.location: Albert S. Samuels Clock (856 Market Street between Powell and Stockton)
properties.plot: The sitcom takes us into the further adventures of the characters from the movie of the same name.

properties.location: Lefty O' Doul Drawbridge/ 3rd Street Bridge (3rd Street, China Basin)
properties.plot: The recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent, leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

properties.location: Little Embarcadero btwn Powell and Mason
properties.plot: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

properties.film: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
properties.film_year: The Last Black Man in San Francisco  (2019)
properties.plot: A young man searches for home in the changing city that seems to have left him behind.

properties.location: Star's Café (55 Golden Gate Avenue at Van Ness)
properties.plot: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.
